description:
Mochizuki General Hospital boasts some of the most well-trained (and well-endowed) nurses in town. But though these ladies spend much of their day battling disease, their after-hours are spent fighting a very different sort of sickness... Under the leadership of the hospital chairman, a handful of staff members and local teenagers form a group of mercenary assassins, targeting the "cancers" of society and excising those individuals before their wickedness spreads.

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Terrorism
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a terrorist or terrorist organization.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Motorcycles
tags.description: Prominently features the use of motorcycles.

node.description:
__Doujin Circle:__ GEBOKUDOU (下僕堂), DIGITAL ACCEL WORKS (デジタルアクセルワークス). 

[Website](http://www.ghost-d.com/ssss/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ss_shouji)

Early in his career, Shouji Satou was the former assistant of mangaka [Koshi Rikudo](https://anilist.co/staff/99237/Koshi-Rikudo).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/加戸誉夫)

Currently part of [Studio Mother](https://anilist.co/studio/6638/). Former long-time member of [Xebec](https://anilist.co/studio/27/). Originally from [Ashi Productions](https://anilist.co/studio/196/), which he joined after graduating from Osaka University of Arts in 1985.

Akio Takami is an animator, animation supervisor and character designer. Originally a member of Ashi Productions, he joined Xebec in the 90s, where he participated in most of Xebec's works and became one of the key people at the studio.
**Uemura Shunichi (植村俊一)** is a Japanese producer and music producer.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/濱野高年)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule.
Yukinao Shimoji was a Japanese producer and production manager. Formerly the president and representative director of [Xebec](https://anilist.co/studio/27/Xebec).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/安田猛_(ブシロード%29)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [photographer](https://anilist.co/staff/220867/)._

Akio Takami is an animator, animation supervisor and character designer. Originally a member of Ashi Productions, he joined Xebec in the 90s, where he participated in most of Xebec's works and became one of the key people at the studio.
